title: No stoppage of allowance to any employee : Railways Ministry
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP):The Ministry of Railways on Wednesday clarified that it has not stopped TA DA of any employee in the Railway Police.
According to the spokesman of Pakistan Railways, earlier TADA was fixed on monthly basis however now it would be issued on the basis of duty.
He said the expenditure was being reduced as per policy of the government, .
